Name: Brick Odyssey
About the game: A storm approaches on the horizon. Stirred by the dark rituals of a heinous cult, the forces of evil are once again emerging from their lair. Humanity needs a champion to protect it. Are you ready to embark on the Odyssey that awaits you ? Innovative Gameplay Your weapon is only the catalyst, you will only reach your true potential by mastering the powers of your inner field of bricks. Mixing block-breaker gameplay with roguelike progression, Brick Odyssey offers an innovative take on both genres, seamlessly combined to create something new. Destroy bricks to deal damage. Speed is of the essence before the forces of evil reach you. Upgrade your bricks with powerful buffs. Mix and match your skills, brick upgrades and relics to create a winning combination that will slice through your foes! Brick Odyssey's gameplay is easy to understand and hard to master. Hone your skill to guide the ball with precision. With the progression system and its format adapted to speedrunning, the game offers challenging gameplay for new and experienced players alike. Choose Your Adventurer Three heroes are at your disposal to guide them through their perilous journey in uncharted lands. Each hero has different starting abilities and their own mechanics to form a unique gameplay, but you will have to prove your worth to unlock their powers. You want more? Do not fret, more are on their way and will be made available soon! A Large Roster Of Monsters Fight or perish. Your enemies grow stronger as you progress. You will encounter elite troops with their own mechanics and skills. Those will require the utmost proficiency from you, adapt to their tactics and vanquish them in epic battles. An Adventure With No End You are able to relive your adventure over and over again. So learn from your previous tries and do better every time. Random events and rewards will keep you on your toes from start to finish. If you make it to the end, you will unlock new rewards and increased difficulty settings. Are you the hero who will defeat the most challenging storm once and for all?
